title: Five Reasons a Tagline Is Important for Your Law Firm Website
description: Everyone knows that first impressions are important, but too many law firms neglect a component of their website that is critical to making a positive first impression: the tagline. A carefully crafted tagline can make your law firm stand out in visitorsâ€™ minds as relevant and memorable. Follow these tips to ensure your tagline is working to create a positive first impression.
